snippet.title: Mira trailer - slavic point and click adventure game
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1185740/Mira/

Our social media:
https://twitter.com/miragamepl
https://www.facebook.com/miragamepl/

Set in a post-World War 2 city of Cracow the game tales the story of a young woman named Mira, who ventures on a magical journey to the world of slavic myths and legends. Can she discover the true about her destiny? Endure among creatures forgotten by history?  Learn where the water nymphs, imps and drowners where hiding for ages? The answers could be found only while traversing through the mystical world of Navia, which players will discover thanks to hand painted art and unique music. The world of Slavic myths is closer than ever before.

Want to know more? Visit our website: http://miragame.pl/

Or reach us directly through:
kontakt@miragame.pl
